name: Borneo
hint: Third-largest island in the world, shared by Malaysia, Indonesia, and Brunei

name: Sumatra
hint: Sixth-largest island in the world, western Indonesia, home to orangutans and tigers

name: Java
hint: Most populated island on Earth, home to Indonesia's capital Jakarta

name: Honshu
hint: Largest island of Japan, home to Tokyo, Osaka, and Mount Fuji

name: Sri Lanka
hint: Teardrop-shaped island nation off India's southern coast, formerly called Ceylon

name: Taiwan
hint: Island off China's southeast coast, historically known as Formosa by Portuguese sailors

name: Bali
hint: Famous Indonesian island known for its temples, rice paddies, and surf beaches

name: Sulawesi
hint: Uniquely shaped Indonesian island, formerly called Celebes, known for biodiversity

name: Luzon
hint: Largest island of the Philippines, home to the capital Manila

name: Mindanao
hint: Second-largest island in the Philippines, known for its tropical rainforests

name: Hokkaido
hint: Northernmost of Japan's main islands, famous for skiing, hot springs, and lavender fields

name: Phuket
hint: Thailand's largest island, a world-famous beach and resort destination

name: Sakhalin
hint: Largest Russian island, north of Japan in the Pacific, rich in oil and gas

name: Jeju Island
hint: Volcanic resort island off South Korea, home to Mount Hallasan

name: Socotra
hint: Isolated Yemeni island with alien-looking dragon blood trees, the 'Galapagos of the Indian Ocean'
